001package net.tvburger.jdl.cnn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.ActivationFunction;
004
005import java.util.ArrayList;
006import java.util.List;
007
008public class ConvolutionalLayer implements ConvolutionalNetworkLayer {
009
010    private final ConvolutionalShape inputShape;
011    private final ConvolutionalShape outputShape;
012    private final List<ConvolutionalFilter> filters;
013    private final int stride;
014    private final int padding;
015    private final ActivationFunction activationFunction;
016
017    public static ConvolutionalLayer create(int width, int height, ActivationFunction activationFunction) {
018        return create(width, height, 1, activationFunction);
019    }
020
021    public static ConvolutionalLayer create(int width, int height, int depth, ActivationFunction activationFunction) {
022        return create(width, height, depth, 3, 1, 0, activationFunction);
023    }
024
025    public static ConvolutionalLayer create(int width, int height, int depth, int size, int stride, int padding, ActivationFunction activationFunction) {
026        ConvolutionalShape inputShape = new ConvolutionalShape(width, height, depth, 1, null);
027        return create(inputShape, size, stride, 1, padding, activationFunction);
028    }
029
030    public static ConvolutionalLayer create(ConvolutionalShape inputShape, int size, int filters, int stride, int padding, ActivationFunction activationFunction) {
031        int outputWidth = (inputShape.getWidth() - size + 2 * padding) / stride + 1;
032        int outputHeight = (inputShape.getHeight() - size + 2 * padding) / stride + 1;
033        ConvolutionalShape outputShape = new ConvolutionalShape(outputWidth, outputHeight, filters, 1, null);
034        return create(inputShape, outputShape, filters, stride, padding, activationFunction);
035    }
036
037    public static ConvolutionalLayer create(ConvolutionalShape inputShape, ConvolutionalShape outputShape, int size, int stride, int padding, ActivationFunction activationFunction) {
038        List<ConvolutionalFilter> filters = new ArrayList<>();
039        for (int i = 0; i < outputShape.getChannels(); i++) {
040            filters.add(ConvolutionalFilter.create(size, inputShape.getChannels()));
041        }
042        return new ConvolutionalLayer(inputShape, outputShape, filters, stride, padding, activationFunction);
043    }
044
045    private ConvolutionalLayer(ConvolutionalShape inputShape, ConvolutionalShape outputShape, List<ConvolutionalFilter> filters, int stride, int padding, ActivationFunction activationFunction) {
046        this.inputShape = inputShape;
047        this.outputShape = outputShape;
048        this.filters = filters;
049        this.stride = stride;
050        this.padding = padding;
051        this.activationFunction = activationFunction;
052    }
053
054    @Override
055    public ConvolutionalShape getInputShape() {
056        return inputShape;
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    public ConvolutionalShape getOutputShape() {
061        return outputShape;
062    }
063
064    public List<ConvolutionalFilter> getFilters() {
065        return filters;
066    }
067
068    public int getStride() {
069        return stride;
070    }
071
072    public int getPadding() {
073        return padding;
074    }
075
076    public int getDimensions() {
077        return filters.size();
078    }
079
080    @Override
081    public ConvolutionalShape transform(ConvolutionalShape input) {
082        ConvolutionalShape output = getOutputShape().clone();
083        for (int d = 0; d < output.getChannels(); d++) {
084            ConvolutionalFilter filter = filters.get(d);
085            for (int y = 0; y < output.getHeight(); y++) {
086                for (int x = 0; x < output.getWidth(); x++) {
087                    for (ConvolutionalShape window : getWindows(input)) {
088                        float value = filter.applyToWindow(window);
089                        if (activationFunction != null) {
090                            value = activationFunction.activate(value);
091                        }
092                        output.setElement(value, x, y, d + 1);
093                    }
094                }
095            }
096        }
097        return output;
098    }
099
100    private List<ConvolutionalShape> getWindows(ConvolutionalShape input) {
101        if (filters.isEmpty()) {
102            return List.of();
103        }
104        ConvolutionalShape filterSize = filters.getFirst().getShape();
105        List<ConvolutionalShape> windows = new ArrayList<>();
106        for (int x = -padding; x <= input.getWidth() - filterSize.getWidth() + padding; x = x + stride) {
107            for (int y = -padding; y <= input.getHeight() - filterSize.getHeight() + padding; y = y + stride) {
108                for (int c = 1; c <= input.getChannels(); c++) {
109                    for (int i = 0; i < input.getCount(); i++) {
110                        ConvolutionalShape window = filterSize.clone();
111                        for (int yi = 0; yi < window.getHeight(); yi++) {
112                            for (int xi = 0; xi < window.getWidth(); xi++) {
113                                float value;
114                                if (x + xi < 0 || x + xi >= input.getWidth() || y + yi < 0 || y + yi >= input.getHeight()) {
115                                    value = 0f;
116                                } else {
117                                    value = input.getElement(x + xi, y + yi, c, i);
118                                }
119                                window.setElement(value, xi, yi, c, i);
120                            }
121                        }
122                        windows.add(window);
123                    }
124                }
125            }
126        }
127        return windows;
128    }
129}
